content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the district court in ljubljana the case involved a cost procedure and lasted for 1 year 9 months and 6 days the final resolution of the case divided a real estate property worth 41000 eur between two exspouses the plaintiff was awarded 710 of the property while the defendant was awarded 310 the decision was based on a specific law called the civil procedure act specifically section 306 the court settlement in this case is confidential and there is no available translation of the document
